TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_LISTPAD_INFO extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Filled by the method to specify the title text, optional button text, and optional button command identification for a list-view task pad.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The nCommandID is passed to the <xref:Microsoft.CLRAdmin.IExtendTaskPad.TaskNotify(Microsoft.CLRAdmin.IDataObject,System.Object@,System.Object@)> method when the user clicks the button.
For more information about programming with the MMC\_LISTPAD\_INFO structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
